long_description: A performance saddle built for women, the Terry Butterfly Century Saddle features foam cushioning to absorb shock and take your comfort up a notch during long days in the saddle. Specially engineered layer of shock-absorbent foam boosts comfort during long rides. Sculpted shape and wide cutout relieves pressure from sensitive areas. Seamless Lorica synthetic cover reduces chafing.
short_description: A performance saddle built for women, the Terry Butterfly Century Saddle features foam cushioning to absorb shock and take your comfort up a notch during long days in the saddle.
